name: 曾德樟
objective:
1.Introduction and Review
2.Pulse Modulation
3.Baseband Data Transmission
4.Digital Band-Pass Modulation Techniques
5.Noise in Digital Communications
schedule:
1.Introduction and  Review:(第一週-第三週)
(1). Digital Communication Systems
(2). Random Process
(3). White Noise / Narrowband Noise
2.Pulse Modulation:(第四週-第七週)
(1). Sampling Process
(2). PAM/PWM/PPM
(3). PCM/DM/DPCM
3.Baseband Data Transmission:(第八週-第十週)
(1). Baseband Transmission of Digital Data
(2). Nyquist Channel
(3). Baseband Transmission of M-ary Data
4.Digital Band-Pass Modulation Techniques:(第十一週-第十四週)
(1). BASK/PSK/FSK
(2). Noncoherent Digital Modulation Schemes
(3). M-ary Digital Modulation Schemes
5.Noise in Digital Communications:(第十五週-第十八週)
(1). Detection of BPSK in Noise
(2). Detection of QPSK and QAM in Noise
(3). Optimum Detection of BFSK
(4). Differential Detection in Noise
scorePolicy:
1. 期中考、平時考、期末考與作業。
2. 出席率。
materials: Introduction to Analog & Digital Communications 2/E, S. Haykin and M. Moher, John Wiley & Sons, 2007
